aesop.name: Aesop
aesop.description: The world's best corgi. Click on check for more information!
aesop.info: When you click on check, more detailed information appears. You can now close this window!

badge.name: Attorney's Badge
badge.description: My attorney's badge. Proof that I can practice law.
badge.info: Looking great. I shined it this morning.

autopsyreport.name: Autopsy Report
autopsyreport.info: The victim died at precisely 2:00am Monday morning. The cause of death is unclear, but thought to be a stabbing.

teacupshards.name: Shattered Teacup
teacupshards.description: A teacup that was shattered at the scene of the crime.
teacupshards.info: The shards still have dregs of tea on them. I wonder what happened . . .

victim.name: Bracket
victim.info: The victim in this case. Has some sort of relationship to Java. A rivalry ...?
